import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Associate or unassociate one or more tags with a class."}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/org/{orgid}/taxonomy/associate-tags-with-entity"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This API associates or unassociates one or more tags with a class.  Each tag in the request body must have a unique `tag_number` (1, 2, 3...). This number is appended to all fields within each tag entity (e.g., `tagid_1`, `context_1`). Each tag entity also includes an `action` field specifying 'add' or 'remove'.  Only 'add' and 'remove' actions are currently supported. A maximum of 3 tags can be associated with a class at a time.  Supports classes only. 

**Permissions:** Teacher, Admin

**Events:** `CLASS.TAXONOMY_TAG_ASSOCIATION_ADD` (success, error), `CLASS.TAXONOMY_TAG_ASSOCIATION_REMOVE` (success, error)

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"orgid","in":"path","description":"The organization ID.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","description":"Authentication token.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request body containing tag association details.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["entity_id","entity_type","tags"],"type":"object","properties":{"entity_type":{"type":"string","enum":["class"]},"entity_id":{"type":"string"},"tags":{"minItems":1,"type":"array","example":[{"tagid_1":"tag_id","tagname_1":"tag_name","taxonomyid_1":"tag_taxonomy_id","context_1":"tag_context","action":"add/remove"}],"items":{"type":"object","properties":{}}}},"title":"associateTagsBody"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

>
  
</StatusCodes>
